Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Zaria is a salient, sinewy tigress with short, prestine amber and black striped fur. She is sitting on the freshly trimmed grass of the park, a row of poppy plants arrayed behind her. Her feet, adorned by black leather high heels are tucked to her right side as she props herself up comfortably with with left hand. Her hands and arms are covered with a pair of gossamer white sendal long gloves. Her waist length, dynamic black-cherry hair cascades down over her shoulders. A cinereous, silver ear cuff decorates her right ear and a cool-blue topaz and opalescent silver stud glints from her left lobe. Her snapdragon red lips are curved into a light smile, barely revealing a hint of her achromatic white teeth. Her cheeks seem slightly colored as a soft blush spreads barely noticeably across her face. A red organza cordial dress perfectly matching and augmenting her lips hugs perfectly to her delicately striped breasts, along her sinewy body down her wholesome thighs then the frills covering most of her limber legs.
A painting of Zaria, elegantly dressed in a fabulous dress, sitting in the park.
